subject: Shipment Details
description_text:
Hello. I recently purchased the VAM Pro units on order #SSN1597. I noted that the shipment date would be 10 June. Can you please confirm when you plan to ship the order above. I am looking forward to receiving the units for my pedals! 

Thank you.

Kind regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Gavin and Lynda Miller,  Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the first batch of orders is expected to begin shipping between June 16th and 18th. International express shipping will be used, ensuring fast delivery.
